title: Feature Request: Reconnection with Enter
author: smogbh
body_snippet: It could be more useful that once I've done some operations on particular device, after login timeout expire, I could reconnect to the same device with Enter key instead of right click -> Reconnect on the tab.

iterations.description: UX enhancement to allow Enter key to reconnect a disconnected session tab instead of requiring context menu

notes:
AI triage (claude): UX enhancement to allow Enter key to reconnect a disconnected session tab instead of requiring context menu
Approach: Add KeyDown handler on ConnectionWindow that detects Enter key when the active tab has a disconnected protocol, then triggers the existing Reconnect logic already used by the context menu
